overview: Follow the life of a tween-age boy named Zack, whose world turns upside down when his family moves to a new town, then turns bizarre when he gets "zapped" into his school backpack. But Zack's life and attitude are transformed as he learns stores from the Bible, about kids who were living out their faith in God, from a zany group of animated characters living in his backpack.
title: Zack's Zap Pack
